name: two-registers-web
description: Two Registers - Modern Website with React and Tailwind CSS

scripts.build: cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install --force && npm run build && cd .. && cp -r frontend/dist build
scripts.build:force: cd frontend && npm install --force && npm run build && cd .. && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('build')) fs.rmSync('build', { recursive: true, force: true }); require('./build.js').copyDir('frontend/dist', 'build');"

author: Gautam Nimase
